revised_title: Obituary of William Edward Ayrton: A Pioneering Electrical Engineer and Educator
tldr: The obituary of William Edward Ayrton, a prominent electrical engineer and educator, highlights his contributions to the field of electrical engineering, including the establishment of electrical laboratories and the education of thousands of students who went on to become successful engineers. Ayrton's innovative teaching methods and emphasis on practical, hands-on learning have had a lasting impact on the field.
